import '../styles/Cart.css' import { useState } from 'react' function Cart() { const initialState = 0; const [cart, setCart] = useState(initialState) const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const monsteraPrice = 8 return isOpen ? (

Panier

  • Monstera : {monsteraPrice}€

Total : {monsteraPrice * cart }€

) : (
) } export default Cart
